entry.title: How to particpate
entry.summary: Tiny Junkyard provides private web pages for each participant. To get started, simply click the button! It will launch a secure web shop that allows you to maintain an inventory of items that you have access to, to sell or trade with anyone, with no…
entry.content:
Tiny Junkyard provides private web pages for each participant. To get started, simply click the button!  It will launch a secure web shop that allows you to maintain an inventory of items that you have access to, to sell or trade with anyone, with no obligation to us. 

 

By using this app, you agree not to hold us liable for damages, loss of property, etc.  Thank you.

entry.title: Sharing makes us all stronger
entry.summary: Collaborating for a better future.Tiny? When thinking of junk, its usually something we want less of, we want it reduced. 'Tiny' refers to the fact that we support a digital junkyard that is in constant state of motion via planning, selling, trading, and maintenance, with…
entry.content:
Collaborating for a better future.

Tiny?

When thinking of junk, its usually something we want less of, we want it reduced. 'Tiny' refers to the fact that we support a digital junkyard that is in constant state of motion via planning, selling, trading, and maintenance, with recycling or disposal as a last option. Our goal is to divert more and landfill less.

Requesting materials

Tiny Junkyard is a connector that helps us to have virtual space to work from. Alot of the work that needs to be done is basically PLANNING, coming up with a good design... That's why we are working to provide an intelligent junkyard robot assistant. The assistant we are working on is design to help assist each of us here at the Tiny Junkyard with sharing and trading items so that more projects get built .

 
See all listings

Our values

Easier ways to share items which could othewise go to waste, good designs, and the benefits of building with your neighbors are the common goals that motivate this project. Trading and collaborating locally creates cohesive community and can make work more enjoyable.

Request/ share / design with materials

Tiny Junkyard is a connector that helps us to have virtual space to work from. Alot of the work that needs to be done is basically PLANNING, coming up with a good design... That's why we are working to provide an intelligent junkyard robot assistant. The assistant we are working on is design to help assist each of us here at the Tiny Junkyard with sharing and trading items so that more projects get built .
